question.text: You are on the motorway. Luggage falls from your vehicle. What should you do?

explanation.text: If any object falls onto the motorway carriageway from your vehicle pull over onto the hard shoulder near an emergency telephone and phone for assistance. Don’t stop on the carriageway or attempt to retrieve anything.

answer.text: Stop at the next emergency telephone and contact the police
Stop on the motorway and put on hazard lights while you pick it up
Walk back up the motorway to pick it up
Pull up on the hard shoulder and wave traffic down
